text: This is a list of cities in Mongolia. In the table a light pink color means the number of people went down. Light green means a growth of 1 to 2 percent. Dark green means growth of more than 2 percent List of Mongolian cities Rank Name Mongolian Inhabitants (1979 est.Statistisches Bundesamt: Statistik des Auslands - Mongolei, 1985Encyclopedia "Cartactual," published 01/01/85) Inhabitants (1989 est.http://www.nso.mn/eng/index.php National Statistical Office of Mongolia (accessed May, 2 2007)) Inhabitants (2000 census(2000) PADCO: Mongolia Urban Development and Housing Sector Strategy, Final Report, Vol. 2, published 2005.)
